title: No service on Punggol LRT West Loop due to power fault

updates.text: 09/01, 10.25pm: Punggol LRT West Loop full svc has resumed. Free bus rides have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
09/01, 10.19pm: Punggol LRT West Loop full service has resumed. Free bus rides still available at designated stops near the stations.
09/01, 10.04pm: No service on Punggol LRT West Loop due to a power fault. Free bus rides available at designated stops near the stations.
